description: Change of use of vacant Class B1 office floorspace at third and fourth floor levels to provide two self-contained flats.
decision_conditions: REASON: In the absence of any evidence of a suitable marketing campaign, the proposed change of use would result in the loss of existing Class B1 office accommodation in the Central Activities Zone that is considered suitable for occupation by small and medium sized enterprises and would be contrary to policies E4 (Loss of business use), E13 (Protection of Premises for Small Firms and Opportunities for Business Start Ups) and H3 (New housing and changes of use to residential) of the Islington Unitary Development Plan 2002 and policies 2A.4 (The Central Activities Zone), 3B.2 (Office demand and supply), 5G.2 (Strategic priorities for the Central Activities Zone), 5G.3 (Central Activities: Offices) and 5G.5 (Predominantly Local Activities in the Central Activities Zone) of The London Plan (Consolidated with Alterations since 2004) and strategic policies 7 (Bunhill and Clerkenwell) and 13 (Employment spaces) of the Islington Core Strategy Draft Submission Document 2010.
